I have no idea where to begin. like I'm serious, This game is a masterpiece and a gem. The graphics are amazing! The physics somehow run smoothly on my seriously potato laptop. The co-op is hilarious. I've had my best moments on portal 2 there. I met a good friend too. We just mess around and it's amazing. It's great to experience this game with my friends and other people. It's game changing. Anyway, i've said too much sorry I just love it too much. (P.S. get the bundle pack you get two portal games for less than one)
